com.maxeye.einksdk.YModem

类 YModem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxeye.einksdk.YModem.YModem
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileStreamThread.DataRaderListener

    public class YModem
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileStreamThread.DataRaderListener
    THE YMODEM: *SENDER: ANDROID APP *------------------------------------------* RECEIVER: BLE DEVICE* HELLO BOOTLOADER ---------------------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* C SOH 00 FF filename0fileSizeInByte0MD5[90] ZERO[38] CRC CRC----->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK C STX 01 FE data[1024] CRC CRC ---------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK STX 02 FF data[1024] CRC CRC ---------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK ... ...

    STX 08 F7 data[1000] CPMEOF[24] CRC CRC ----------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK EOT ----------------------------------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK SOH 00 FF ZERO[128] ------------------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK <---------------------------------------------------------------* MD5_OK

    Created by leonxtp on 2017/9/16. Modified by leonxtp on 2017/9/16

      • YModem

        public YModem(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.String filePath,
              java.lang.String fileNameString,
              YModemListener yModemListener)
        Construct of the YModemBLE,you may don't need the fileMD5 checking,remove it
        参数:
        filePath - absolute path of the file
        fileNameString - file name for sending to the terminal
        yModemListener -
